message: Alright, history lesson time for all of you young idiots, ESPECIALLY you, . Your statement, """"If you want cops and people of other ethnicities to respect you, you have to respect yourself"""" is probably one of the most misleading statements that you can make! This country, this society has been systematicalli programed to denigrate and disrespect black people for over 400 years! Yes, respect yourself, but do NOT fool youself into thinking that translates into other races and cultures respecting you! Do you think that because you are educated and have a good job that you are respected as a black man? In this society? We have ti demand the respect as human beings that has been denied us for centuries! Tell me, how are YOU showing tga you care about """"us""""? How do YOU react when the young black kid is killed with a toy gun in his hand, yet the old white man that has been shooting at the police is somehow taken into custody without injury? Is that your definition of """"respecting yourself""""?

I like Perry, but I believe his early and vigorous attack on Trump just doomed him. I'm not a Trump supporter, my favorite is Ted Cruz. Perry comes out early and rips Trump, his support just never builds up. Cruz has been neutral or even complimentary of Trump, his support is steadily rising.

OH MY GOD. I DONT CARE WHAT TRUMP DID YEARS AGO. THAT CONVERSATION WAS A PRIVATE CONVERSATION AND IT SHOULD NOT HAVE BEEN RECORDED AND USED AGAINST HIM. BILL CLINTON WAS A WOMANIZER TOO AND AT THAT TIME. HE WAS THE PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES. HE WAS IMPEACHED AND WAS STILL KEPT PRESIDENT BECAUSE PEOPLE WANTED HIM TO FINISH HIS TERM ARE YOU KIDDING ME? HE HAD HIS AFFAIRS WITH MONICA LEWINSKY AND JENNIFER FLOWERS . PEOPLE COMPLAIN WE HAVE NO JOBS. CLINTON WAS THE PRESIDENT WHO SIGNED FOR NAFTA TO TAKE OUR INDUSTRY TO FOREIN COUNTRIES. THATS WHEN THINGS WERE CHANGING IN OUR COUNTRY AND GOING DOWN HILL I KNOW TRUMP SAYS THINGS THAT HE SHOULDNT SAY. IT ONLY COMES BACK AND SMACK HIM IN THE FACE. AT FIRST I THOUGHT HAVING HIM AS PRESIDENT MADE ME NERVOUS. BUT WHEN I HEARD PENCE SAYING. """"TRUMP IS NOT A POLITICIAN. HES A BUSINESS MAN. AND AS LONG HE HAS A GOOD CABINET OF PEOPLE BEHIND HE WILL DO GOOD. WE NEED A BUSINESS MAN. TO TRY AND HELP WITH THE DEBT OF THIS COUNTRY. WE HAVE THESE DEBATES AND ITS JUST GARBAGE . ALL OUR POLITICIANS ARE CORRUPT. HILLARY IS A CROOK AND A DEMEANING OF WOMEN TOO. YOU WANT HER AS A LEADER OF OUR COUNTRY FOR ALL WHAT SHE DID? Really THE CLINTONS STOLE FROM OUR WHITE HOUSE WHEN THEY LEFT THE WHITE HOUSE CAUSE THEY SAID THEY WERE POOR. REALLY? SHE SHOULD BE IN JAIL. IF SOMEONE ELSE DID WHAT SHE DID ALL THEY WOULD HAVE BEEN PUT AWAY FOR LIFE. HOW QUIET EVERYTHING IS ABOUT HER NOW. WHAT ABOUT THAT PERSON WHO WAS GOING TO TALK ABOUT HER EMAILS AND COUPLE DAYS LATER HES DEAD. DOESNT THAT SOUND FUNNY. WHAT ABOUT RIGGING THE DEBATE. WHAT ABOUT BENGAZI AND THOSE PEOPLE BEGGING FOR HELP AND OBAMA AND CLINTON COVERED IT ALL UP. ITS TIME TO CLEAN OUT WASHINGTON AND START NEW. TRUMP HAS SAID THINGS BUT THEY ARENT AS BAD AS WHAT CLINTON HAS DONE. SHE HASNT REALLY SAID MUCH AS TO WHAT SHE IS GONNA DO FOR OUR COUNTRY. IM NERVOUS WITH TRUMP. BUT DO WE REALLY HAVE MUCH CHOICE? I KNOW ONE THING. I WOULD NEVER VOTE FOR CLINTON. THEY ALREADY WENT DOWN THAT ROAD. AND LOOK WHERE WE ARE IM A WOWAN. AND YES IT WOULD BE NICE TO HAVE A WOMAN PRESIDENT. BUT SHE ISNT THE ONE FOR THE JOB. ITS TIME TRY SOMETHING NEW. HOW MUCH WORST CAN IT GET. WE NEED TO START HAVING FAITH AND TRUST IN OUR COUNTRY . JUST THINK OF ALL THE LIVES THAT WERE LOST DEFENDING IT. I THINK WE OWE OUR MILITARY . DONT YOU?
